citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
8/27/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling the phone number on the
account, and waited approximately 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:30 am on 
8/27/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling the phone number on the 
account, and waited approximately 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
